Key Arguments: The proposed legislation should be completely scrapped.
There should be protections for free speech in Australia.
The government has previously censored free speech, as seen during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Some information that was censored during the pandemic was later found to be correct.
The legislation gives too much power to unelected officials, which undermines the rights of the people.
Notable Quotes: My will dictates that this bill must be scraped in its entirety and protection put in place to protect free speech in this country.
We have seen the government sensor free speech already with the covid debacle.
By giving power to unelected officials the government is handing over the rights of the People of this once great country.
